rules_text:
Vigilance
This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it if you control a distinguished nonland permanent or have cast a distinguished instant or sorcery spell this turn. [i](Legendary cards and cards with power, toughness, or mana value 5 or more are distinguished.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“My lord has the knowledge you seek, but I warn you... it may not be what you want to hear.”[/i]
